It stars Molly Ringwald, Ally Sheedy, and Judd Nelson, among others, and it's a heartwarming exploration of teenage life in the 1980s.

If you prefer something more dramatic with an intense performance, "Downfall" might be up your alley. Starring Bruno Ganz, this film delves into the personal struggles of a high-ranking Nazi official as World War II comes to a close. It's a powerful and poignant portrayal of a man grappling with his past actions and the consequences that follow.
